body_html:
@sata @mrry Seems that shuffle_and_repeat with cache doesn't work instead dataset.shuffle(buffer_size, reshuffle_each_iteration=True).repeat(count) works.
Docs tells that is the same call. Is there any different internal details that invalid the iterator of shuffle_and_repeat combined with cache?
body_text:
@sata @mrry Seems that shuffle_and_repeat with cache doesn't work instead dataset.shuffle(buffer_size, reshuffle_each_iteration=True).repeat(count) works.
Docs tells that is the same call. Is there any different internal details that invalid the iterator of shuffle_and_repeat combined with cache?
body:
@sata @mrry Seems that `shuffle_and_repeat` with cache doesn't work instead `dataset.shuffle(buffer_size, reshuffle_each_iteration=True).repeat(count)` works. 
Docs tells that is the [same call](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/data/shuffle_and_repeat). Is there any different internal details that invalid the iterator of `shuffle_and_repeat` combined with cache?
